Reviews.Title: Windows 8 is slow and I've been trying to boot from CD for last 2 hours
Reviews.Author: Clarence Tunstall
Reviews.Content: I have been in the IT industry for over 16 years and this is the worst laptop I have ever seen, period. Windows 8 runs so slow that the time it takes to load pictures from a phone is measured in minutes. My wife, instead of using this laptop to browse the web, uses her phone instead as its quicker. At this moment, I found this while looking for a way to boot by CD so I can install Windows 7 on it and have been trying to do this for the last couple of hours. If I had it to do all over again, there's no way I'd buy this laptop. Do yourself a favor, RUN.

Reviews.Title: Awful - Toshiba Satellite C855D-S5302
Reviews.Author: bankerkys
Reviews.Content: Toshiba Satellite C855D-S5302 - terrible laptop computer.  The unit cannot run Windows 8 properly.  DO not get sucked into buying one of these or you will regret it.  Toshiba should be sued for selling a computer like this one.
